### Checklist
Please ensure your extension meets all requirements:

#### Structure
- [ ] Follows naming convention (`@framers/agentos-ext-*`)
- [ ] Has all required files (package.json, manifest.json, README.md, LICENSE, tsconfig.json)
- [ ] Extension ID follows pattern (`com.framers.ext.*`)
- [ ] MIT licensed

#### Code Quality
- [ ] TypeScript with strict mode
- [ ] Implements ITool interface correctly
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or API keys
- [ ] Proper error handling
- [ ] Input validation

#### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests included
- [ ] Test coverage >80%
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Integration test with AgentOS

#### Documentation
- [ ] README with clear usage examples
- [ ] Configuration instructions
- [ ] API documentation
- [ ] Example code snippets

### Testing
```bash
# How to test your extension
npm test
npm run test:coverage
```
